genresAdvancedInfo.name: classical trombone
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Classical trombone is a genre of music that features the trombone, a brass instrument with a slide that is used to change the pitch. This genre is known for its bold and powerful sound, as well as its ability to convey a wide range of emotions. The trombone is often used in orchestral music, but it can also be featured in smaller ensembles or solo performances. The performer must have exceptional skill and technique to bring out the full potential of the instrument.
